issue.title: [Python/C++] Implement NativeFile interfaces for Amazon S3
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1119](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1119). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While we support HDFS and the local file system now, it would be nice to also support S3 and eventually other cloud storage natively

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1119?focusedCommentId=16941883) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Both C++ implementation and python bindings are implemented.

`[~apitrou]` Is this about supporting s3 schema in the output_stream and input_stream functions? Like `pa.output_stream('s3://...')`?

 Or we can simply close it because we already support the functionality with `s3fs.open_*` methods?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1119?focusedCommentId=16978727) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
We can close now.
